tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    permission_level ENUM('admin', 'user') NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_registered DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AppLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    log_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    log_details JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    registration_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_permissions (
    permission_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    permission_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    granted_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_devices (
    device_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_os VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_login TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
    activity_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_security_logs (
    log_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    log_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
